dcterms:description: A large dataset used for training and evaluating speech recognition systems, specifically for the Google English Voice Search task.

dcterms:description: A speech database used for phoneme classification tasks, providing a set of recordings for training and testing speech recognition models.
dcterms:title: TIMIT speech database

dcterms:description: A speech recognition dataset utilized for training deep recurrent neural networks, focusing on improving recognition accuracy.
dcterms:title: TIMIT database

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 3 million utterances from Google voice search and dictation traffic, used for training speech recognition models.
dcterms:title: 3 million utterance dataset
